edge: Bane was formerly a member of the League of Shadows.
Bane abducts Dr. Leonid Pavel from a CIA plane.
Dr. Leonid Pavel is a nuclear physicist who was abducted by Bane from a CIA plane.
The death of Harvey Dent led to the eradication of organized crime in Gotham City through the Dent Act.
James Gordon kept Harvey Dent's killing spree a secret and allowed the blame for his crimes to fall on Batman.
Bruce Wayne is still mourning the death of Rachel Dawes.
Bruce Wayne is a reclusive owner of Wayne Enterprises, which has stagnated since Rachel Dawes' death.
Bane conspires to help John Daggett, a Wayne Enterprises board member, take over the company.
Selina Kyle steals Bruce's prints from Wayne Manor for John Daggett, a Wayne Enterprises board member.
Burglar Selina Kyle steals Bruce's fingerprints from Wayne Manor, which are later used by John Daggett and Bane.
Officer John Blake is an orphan who has deduced Bruce Wayne's secret identity.
used by Batman to verify a series of suspicious financial activities, revealing their false nature and leading to the exposure of the perpetrators

Bruce escapes captivity and returns to Gotham as Batman.
Bane's army clashes with Batman in the streets after Bruce escapes captivity.
Talia reveals herself as Ra's al Ghul's daughter and stabs Bruce, revealing his identity to Gordon.
Catwoman kills Bane during the battle with Batman's army.
Talia entrusts Bane to finish off Batman and reveals that she is Ra's al Ghul's daughter while activating the bomb's detonator.
Gordon blocks the signal, preventing the bomb from exploding.
Alfred discovers that Bruce is alive and in a relationship with Selina.
Blake resigns, revealing his legal first name as Robin.
Blake, whose legal first name is revealed as Robin, resigns from the GCPD and receives a package leading him to the Batcave.
